item.title: [Mw3] Amazing? :D
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:71, topic:420973”]Fuck those haters I see,
Cause I hate that you breathe,
I see you prone,
You little punk,
You little fucking disease,
I got MW3 tatted on the front of my arm,
I pull the tac knife in the back of the jeep,
Cause we drunk drive Cadillacs- we never go far,
And when you see us motherfuckers,
better know who we are.

I got one thing to say to punk asses who hate,
Motherfuckers who don’t know what,
You better watch what you say.
From these noob tubing fucks,
To these faggot ass punks,
You don’t know what it takes,
To get this motherfucking good.[/quote]I love you.

Read full topic

item.title: [Mw3] Amazing? :D
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Revised thoughts: maps are terrible, they look allright but there is really no structure to them. Most guns are fucking overpowered as hell; I mean how can someone possibly kill me across the map with a silenced Machine Pistol?

I think Sledgehammer ruined it to be honest, still yet to play campaign and survival. Multiplayer has some cool new ideas, but the old system really needed tweaking and that hasn’t been done.

Also Activision not giving the developers enough time to make a decent game.

Read full topic

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:57, topic:420973”]Looks crap the only reason I would buy it is to check out the campaign and spec ops, the online is boring as hell (I usually bordem quit at about rank 30). I got BF3 instead and do not regret it.

PS thread cleaned and punishments dealt[/quote]
Then pirate it, that’s what I’m gonna do, but shhh.

Frell:

Had a quick change of heart and Im going to get bf3 instead, mostly because COD has completely weened out real sniping in their games.

You mean you haven’t got it already?! It’s insane, definitely don’t judge it by the beta.

item.title: [Mw3] Amazing? :D
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Someone who actually has played EVERY CoD game, I did not decide to buy this game. The game is very flashy at first (Black ops), but after 1-4 weeks of play time, it just becomes a horrible game.

I’d like thoughts/opinions on this.

item.title: [Mw3] Amazing? :D
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:54, topic:420973”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=523648.msg3810577#msg3810577 date=1320874031]

Game just came in the mail. It’s fun, only came across 1 camper and I kept killing him until he ragequit
Only played 3 games before getting bored of it, now my brother got on and won’t get off until 10.

Yeah its pretty sick, but the campers are what make me rage
[/quote]

Overpowered guns make me rage.[/quote]
I can’t find a decent assault rifle/smg to use, so far the ump and the Scar-L are the best i’ve found >.< But the L118A sucks in the game, AS50 wrecks, sounds like a cannon shot
